sense.def:
Kadar človek
notices something
, se nečesa zave ali nekaj zazna.

seg.quote: I suddenly noticed a friend in the front row.
She noticed him scratching his head.
She noticed that he was staring at her.

sense.def:
A notice
je pisno obvestilo na kraju, kjer ga lahko vsak prebere.

seg.quote: At the main entrance, there was a large notice which said ‘Visitors welcome at any time.’

sense.def:
Kadar človek
gives notice of something
, opozori druge na to, kar se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: The union was to give 28 days' notice of strikes.
She could have done it if she'd had a bit more notice.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
takes notice of something
, posveti pozornost temu, kar reče ali naredi nekdo drug.

seg.quote: I hope the heads of schools will take notice of my comments.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
takes no notice of someone
, tiste osebe ne upošteva.

seg.quote: Take no notice of him. He's always rude to people.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
comes to one's notice
ali
is brought to one's notice
, se človek začne tistega zavedati.

cit.quote: postati pozoren na, biti opozorjen na

seg.quote: Many cases have come to my notice.
We bring to the notice of the committee things that ought to be done.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
escapes one's notice
, človek tistega ne opazi.

seg.quote: It did not escape her notice that he kept glancing at her.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekaj naredi
at short notice
ali
at a moment's notice
, za tisto izve le malo prej, preden mora to narediti.

seg.quote: It's going to be difficult to fix things at such short notice.
It is there ready to be switched on at a moment's notice.

sense.def:
Če bodo razmere obstajale
until further notice
, se bodo nadaljevale, dokler ne bo kdo poskrbel za spremembo ali določil drugače.

seg.quote: The beaches are closed until further notice.

sense.def:
Kadar delodajalec
gives someone notice
, ga obvesti, da bo čez določen čas izgubil službo.

seg.quote: She had been given two weeks' notice at the Works.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
hands in one's notice
, obvesti delodajalca, da namerava čez določen čas nehati delati pri njem.
